data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Picea glauca (White spruce) from sample MOUNTUFE-32

Exposition SE, Slope 30 deg, Geology: Gneis, lehmiger Sandboden, av. Tree height 22 m, Tree cover 40%, Shrub cover 60%, Herb cover 75%, Moss cover 80%, Vegatation type: Plenterart. Urw. m. mehr. Baumgen. Sturmfl. AB, Film number: 818A
